dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.resource.res.log.prot.EquipmentProtectionGroup
dataStructure.description:
This object class represents the information about an equipment protection in a Managed Element.

This entity is optional

This entity is extendable

This entity generates Object Creation notifications

This entity generates Object Deletion notifications

This entity generates Object Discovery notifications

This entity generates Attribute Value Change notifications.
dataStructure.label: EquipmentProtectionGroup

child.name: protectionSchemeState
child.description:
This attribute indicates whether the protection scheme is active or frozen locked out because of a forced switch command. This is an indicator whether the protection scheme is free to switch or is in a state where it cannot switch freely, without an explicit clear command applied to the protection scheme. FORCED_OR_LOCKED_OUT indicates that the entire group is locked; partial locking is indicated by AUTOMATIC (partial locking could be done via operation PerformProtectionCommand in CTP).

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: protectionSchemeState

child.name: reversionMode
child.description:
This attribute defines whether the protection scheme is revertive or not.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: reversionMode

child.name: ituArcStateAndStatusList
child.description:
See supporting document SD1-8_encodingX731M3100.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: ituArcStateAndStatusList

child.name: parameterList
child.description:
This attribute contains a name value list of the associated parameters for the equipment protection group. No equipment Protection Group parameters have been identified.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is invariant

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC disabled (NA)
child.label: parameterList

child.name: type
child.description:
This attribute defines the type of scheme this group represents (so far, only M:N equipment protection has been identified).

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is invariant

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC disabled
child.label: type

child.name: asapRef
child.description:
This attribute indicates the assignment of an Alarm Severity Assignement Profile (ASAP) to the Equipment Protection Group.

This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association EPGHasASAP

This association end is passed by id

This association end is optional

This association end is AVC enabled
child.label: asapRef

child.name: protectedEquipments
child.description:
This object class represents the information about an equipment protection in a Managed Element.

This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association EPGHasProtectedEquipments

This association end is invariant

This association end is passed by id

This association end is optional

This association end is AVC disabled
child.label: protectedEquipments

child.name: protectingEquipments
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association EPGHasProtectingEquipments

This association end is invariant

This association end is passed by id

This association end is optional

This association end is AVC disabled
child.label: protectingEquipments
